newsitem.title: USA: Brazil Fast Food Q4 shr loss narrows.
newsitem.headline: Brazil Fast Food Q4 shr loss narrows.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)
NOTE: Full company name is Brazil Fast Food Corp.
The company's operating results for the year are not comparable to those of the previous year because it was a public holding company before buying the Brazilian fast food chain Bob's in March 1996.
The company later acquired another chain called Big Burger in July 1996, incorporating it into the Bob's operation.
It incurred 361,000 reais in expenses in the fourth quarter when it renamed Big Burger stores as well as opened new stores.
Same store sales for the quarter were 2.2 percent lower than the same period last year. The company did not provide any figures.
